title: Side Effects of Evolving With the Times (with The Cool kids)
description:
This week we talk to hip hop innovators and my dear friends The Cool Kids about adapting to an ever-changing music industry, and growing up.
~
Get tickets to The Black Outside Again Tour! amandaseales.com/tourdates
~
For more content, subscribe to our Patreon (patreon.com/amandaseales)!
